responses.s0_q1: Partially: Some governance roles or committees exist, but not a full unit or office.
responses.s0_q2: Yes: The policy is published, communicated, and aligned with NDP requirements.
responses.s0_q3: Partially: Some roles are defined, but not comprehensively or not assigned.
responses.s1_q0: Yes: A comprehensive architecture exists, is documented, and regularly updated.
responses.s1_q1: Yes: An EDM is in place, covering descriptive, diagnostic, predictive, and prescriptive analytics.
responses.s1_q2: Partially: Some models have been submitted or reviewed, but not all.
responses.s2_q0: Partially: A policy exists but is not fully aligned or not published.
responses.s2_q1: No: No data quality program exists.
responses.s2_q2: Partially: Some KPIs or scorecards exist, but monitoring is inconsistent.
responses.s3_q0: Yes: A formal, published policy exists and is aligned with national standards.
responses.s3_q1: Partially: Some elements of MDM are in place, but not fully implemented.
responses.s3_q2: Yes: All reference data/classifications are coordinated and approved by NPC.
responses.s4_q0: Partially: Policy/program exists but is incomplete or covers only part of the lifecycle.
responses.s4_q1: Yes: There is a clear plan and active implementation to digitize processes.
responses.s5_q0: Yes: A comprehensive catalog and metadata system is in place and maintained.
responses.s5_q1: Partially: Some alignment exists, but not comprehensive.
responses.s6_q0: Partially: Some policies exist, but not fully compliant or reviewed.
responses.s6_q1: Yes: All storage solutions are secure, scalable, and compliant.
responses.s7_q0: Partially: Policy exists but is not published or fully implemented.
responses.s7_q1: No: Data sharing is not secure or compliant.
responses.s7_q2: Yes: Actively participates in the National Data Marketplace.
responses.s8_q0: Partially: Some alignment exists, but not comprehensive.
responses.s8_q1: Partially: Some use cases exist, but not a full portfolio.
responses.s8_q2: Partially: Some compliance, but not comprehensive.
responses.s9_q0: Yes: Opportunities are identified and documented, with legal compliance.
responses.s9_q1: Yes: A formal program and plan exist.
